file_content.text: Steamed in the half shell, that's the best way....
Well? Did you get the meat?
I mean, ah, heroically complete my failed mission to aid the brave people of Balmorra?
And... possibly... pick me up a few... ingredients....
Here's your meat.
Thank you. Here, market price for Colicoid steaks and worth every credit.
You can tell the resistance the warehouse is clear to resume operations.
Well, they should be happy at least.
Can't you think about anything else?
You're disgusting.
I don't smell any Colicoid, so I suppose you left all that delicious meat just rotting somewhere.
The resistance should be happy at least. Maybe they'll sell me the corpses when they clean out the warehouse....
Hmph. I suppose you should get something for the risk you took.
Perhaps the resistance will sell me the Colicoid corpses when they clean out the warehouse....
Ooh, I smell Colicoid flesh. Here, take the money. Just give it to me!
Mmm. I can hardly wait long enough to cook it before tasting....
I'm not saying you need to drag the whole body back--just cut off a few bits. I'll take whatever you bring.
Psst. Hey, you, ah, going into the field?
Lot of Colicoids overrunning this part of Balmorra. Big... juicy... bugs. Nice thick steaks, uh, thoraxes....
Sorry. Got torn up out there. Pain meds make my mind wander. Point is, I've got extra work if you want it. If you're heading out anyway....
What's the danger?
Colicoids. But don't spread it around.
Tell me about the work.
I don't work for free.
Look, I'm a mercenary. I got good pay for this gig; I wasn't in it for the money. You finish the job, I'll give you everything.
I was hired by the resistance. Wanted to clear the Colicoids out of one of their facilities, get the defenses back running.
I thought I'd be getting a free lunch, but the blasted lunch meat fought back.
I can complete your mission.
Were you planning to eat the Colicoids?
Lunch meat?
Mmm. They're best with a little butter, stewed in the shell. Seemed worth the risk trying to retake the resistance warehouse.
What are you talking about?
Resistance used to work out of some warehouse, 'til the bugs moved in.
They wanted us to get inside, activate the generator, then go to their command center and turn on the automated defenses.
You want to help, you can do it for the money or the cause. But I'll pay you extra for every Colicoid roast you bring back.
I do this to aid Balmorra's freedom fighters, not bring you a snack.
I will help the resistance.
I am no butcher, to stand carving meat off a carcass.
I do the mission, no more.
I'll start the defenses. Don't count on me bringing back lunch.
I can clear the target.
First part sounds okay, but there's some things even I won't do for money.
I'll see what I can do.
Well, you're going to be killing them anyway. It's a crime to leave all those prime cuts just rotting there....
But suit yourself. Just the generator and defenses, then. At least someone gets what they want....
Fine. You'll get your meat.
Excellent. I'll prepare the grill!
Oh, I'm being rude. You're invited to join me, once the defenses are up. I make an excellent gizzard souffle....
I'm no butcher. [Refuse quest]
Do you refuse to eat all your kills? How wasteful....
Should know better than to take a mission while I'm hungry....
It's done. Pay me.
Yes, yes, of course. Right after I whip up a little lunch.
You know, it's true what they say: local ingredients really are the best....
The mission first.
No meat, sorry.
Do it yourself.
It should be a crime to waste perfectly good meat....
